casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terry GILMORE. No. 45P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of January 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Plain Error Review Pursuant to N.C.G.S. 7A-31(B)(1)(2)(3)(4)":

*365"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2007."
